input_text:
Job Title: Programmer Analyst 4 - Dynamics 365 Developer

Location: Lansing, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Aroha Technologies, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

Posting title: Programmer Analyst 4 - Dynamics 365 Developer

Closing Date: 4/19/2024

Posting ID: 129343

Desired Career Level: Experienced Non-manager

Minimum Education Level: Bachelor's Degree

Requirements

Travel Required 

No

Security Required

Yes

Candidates submitted must be willing to come onsite to the Lansing, MI office to interview. 

Top Skills & Years of Experience: 

 3-5 years' experience implementing & customizing Power Platforms & Dynamics 365 Cloud solutions with emphasis in Customer Service, Case Management and Field Service.

3-5 Years' Experience In Agile/Scrum Methodology And Practices

 Proficiency in C#, ASP. Net, JSON, JavaScript development or other object-oriented programming languages.

 Experience in all phases of the SDLC (processes and best practices)

 Great interpersonal skills and can be collaborative. Must have strong writing and verbal skills.

Duration: Project is currently anticipated to run for 6 months. 

On-site: Only currently local candidates (within a commutable distance of 1.5 hours max) will be considered. Not interested in candidates who would need to relocate to accept role. Position will be hybrid, onsite 2 days a week. 

Full Job Description Attached

We are seeking an experienced Dynamics 365 developer for our Software as a Service team. This team is responsible for providing Dynamics 365, PowerApps, and SharePoint solutions to meet the business needs of our MDHHS partners. As a Dynamics 365 developer, they will be expected to perform a complete range of information system analysis assignments including, but not limited to, designing, developing, testing, and implementing support for Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions (Dynamics 365, PowerApps, Power Automate, Power BI, and other computer systems and applications). This individual will be looked upon to provide technical support to junior level team members.

Key Responsibilities:

 Develop and maintain MS dynamics 365 applications based on business requirements.

 Configure and customize CRM solutions.

 Implement and troubleshoot integrations with other systems including workflows and web services.

 Implement and maintain access control based on roles and security best practices.

 Collaborate within an Agile/Scrum team.

Define Use Cases And Gather Business Requirements.

 Effectively articulate potential solutions, ideas, and suggestions clearly

 Required skills:

3-5 years' experience implementing & customizing Power Platforms & Dynamics 365 Cloud solutions with emphasis in Customer Service, Case Management and Field Service preferred. Degree in Computer Science/Information Systems or relevant discipline Strong working knowledge in implementing data migrations, third party integrations (API's/SSIS), plug ins, automated CI/CD pipelines, and version management. Proficiency in C#, ASP. Net, JSON, JavaScript development or other object-oriented programming languages Experience in all phases of the SDLC (processes and best practices) Ability to present persuasively and effectively. Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously. Evaluate, design, and implement Microsoft Dynamics 365 business solutions, often working on-site to help customers deploy their solutions. Experience translating technical information into easy-to-understand business concepts. Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills Great interpersonal skills and can be collaborative. Be autonomous and think creatively. 

Strong Writing And Verbal Skills

 3-5 years' experience in Agile/Scrum methodology and practices

 This is a hybrid position, and the candidate must be able to work in person 2 days a week.

 Microsoft CRM Application certification is a plus.

 Experience in Power Automate, Power Apps, Power BI, SharePoint is a plus.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
